descriptionHTML:
Watch a real moving meteor in a lively space. Tap to change watch and phone battery levels.

USEFUL INFORMATIONS
You can change informations just by tapping.
✔ Watch battery level
✔ Phone battery level
✔ Daily step count

CUSTOMIZATION
✔ Customizable ambient mode
✔ Customizable time format

COMPATIBILITY
Support both round and square watches.
Compatible with:
✔ Moto 360
✔ Moto 360 2nd generation
✔ Moto 360 Sport
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition
✔ Asus ZenWatch
✔ Asus ZenWatch 2
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Huawei Watch
✔ TAG Heuer Connected
✔ Fossil Q Founder
✔ Casio Smart Outdoor Watch


Follow us:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Peppy_Works
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PeppyWorks

Support
For any questions or comments on our watch faces, reach out to us at: support@peppyworks.com
comments: Gorgeous watch face with great customisation. Just as beautiful as the other 2 space themed watch faces by this developer. They even added an option to use a colour version as the ambient background which I thought was a nice addition. Would definitely recommend.
Fun This is a cool little watch face. It's got all the basic features and the animations are cool. Definitely one of go to faces üëç
